body.name: Adult Mouth Rinse 20 fl oz. - Wintermint
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 3 hrs 36 mins
body.description: Revolutionary oral care. Nano silver + xylitol + calcium. Neutralizes oral acid. Kills bad breath. Soothes dry mouth. Whitens teeth. Dentist formulated with plant silver. BFP Nanotec: Our patent-pending technology uses plant-based Nano Silver particles to open channels in the BioFilm, aka Plaque to allow the tooth to uptake much needed Calcium & Xylitol while neutralizing oral acid. We created this revolutionary breakthrough because, as dentists, we were frustrated by other products that merely bounce off of the BioFilm barrier and have marginal effects on your teeth. Dentist Formulated: We are Dentists. We engineered this formula because we were tired of telling patients to brush more and enjoy sugar less, even though those things weren't solving the issues. Our revolutionary BFP NanoTech breakthrough is changing the way dentists have looked at dental products for the last 100 years. Kill bad bacteria. Fluoride free. Sugar Doesn't cause cavities, Acid does. - Dr. Ryan Nolan, DMD. Despite popular belief, sometimes brushing more and eating sugar less sugar still doesn’t prevent cavities. Traditional oral care products aren't fighting the real issue, bad PH levels. Harmful oral acid is created when carbs we eat are consumed by bacteria. Carbs sugar + bacteria = acid. Most mouth rinse brands attempt to kill bacteria with formulas that only introduce more and acid into the mouth. Our nano silver rinse neutralizes acid, targets bad bacteria and delivers calcium + xylitol directly to your teeth. See your current product lands on the PH scale. Cavity producing levels. Neutral. Effective. Battery acid 1.0 PH; Soda pop 2.5 PH; 3.9 PH/4.9 PH; 4.3 PH. 7.8 PH. No animal ingredients. Diabetic safe. ElementaSilver.com. Test Your Rinse: Order a free acid test kit to find out where your current mouth rinse lands on the pH scale at ElementaSilver.com. (These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.)

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #18,419 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #144 in Mouthwashes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars clean feeling, works great on odors
reviews.reviewText: Have occasional tonsil rocks which were causing me to have bad breath. Bought the tooth paste and this hoping one or both would help with that. Well, my teeth feel cleaner and do not seem to have any bad breath any more, or the formation of the tonsil rocks (as I call them) I am also not seeing plaque forming on my teeth. Can't wait for my next Dental appointment to see what they have to say. This might seem expensive, but I only use a small amount and it seems to be lasting a long time for me.On same bottle for 3 months. I was using twice per day and have now cut back to just in the morning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: If you have research , you know this product will help you up your moith care game. The taste isn't bad , and it works. The only negative comment is that it tends to crystalize around the lid. Small detail that is outweighed by the benefits of this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this mouthwash!
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t like that drugstore mouthwash was so full of chemicals! It also sometimes burned my mouth.But this one takes just a little, is gentle, mildly minty, and I don’t worry if I swallow some of it. It’s a little pricy but I’m worth it!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great mouth rinse!
reviews.reviewText: I found out about this mouth rinse from a dentist and decided to try it! It prevents the acidic reaction from bacteria in your mouth that causes cavities to form! I did have to replace my first order because the bottle I received was very dirty, it looked like some of the rinse was draining down the outside. The replacement was quick and the new bottle looked much better! The flavor is great and the rinse doesn’t burn your mouth! Don’t be caught off guard when it comes out an orange-ish color, cause I was. Overall this seems to be a great product that I will continue to order.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very soothing to the mouth
reviews.reviewText: I originally did not think I needed to spend a lot on mouthwash when the dentist suggested this to me. I gradually came to use only this one and I prefer the flavor and the lack of alcohol over the standard brands. It is far more soothing to my mouth. I realize it is expensive compared to the popular brand but it is worth is for me. The cinnamon/clove flavor is an excellent choice also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product was recommended by my dentist & I love it. Not too sweet & serms to last.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The bottle/can is warped on the bottom and doesn't sit flat, easily tips. Normally order the bulk sized bag; got the bottle with intention of refilling/reusing but it's not useable even once as delivered. Super annoying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good mouth wash - poor packaging
reviews.reviewText: Mouth wash is good. But mine came dented and the cap not screwed on all the way and mouthwash had leaked everywhere
